alfredsnippet.snippet:
von Weizsaecker, C. F., The World View of Physics, University of Chicago Press, 1952, p.81

"Quantum theory does not explain the characteristic properties of the different sorts of elementary particles which we know to-day. It is, therefore, certain that it must be supplemented by a new, as yet unknown theory."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Quantum Theory Cannot Even Explain Existing Particles
